trends: There have been no other sightings in Bystré
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI just been on my PC and i looked on the window,because ihave seen a light.I heared nothing,cause the window has been closed,I opened it,and again,no noise! There has been three orange fireballs forming a triangle on the sky,they just sharp turned above the theatre (I live in a very smaal city,just we are neightboors of the theatre)and in the sharp turn it still perfectly formed the shape,i recorded on a mobile phone.My comnputer doesnt have bluetooth,just believe me.and when the fireballs flow behind the alley of trees,i lost them,i looked on the computer,just O:OO hours.Believe me,pls,I am scared of it
